alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 06 at 4:04PM EDT until April 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR LOW RH VALUES AND GUSTY WINDS 30 TO 35 MPH FOR THE CATSKILLS, MIDDLE HUDSON VALLEY, UPPER HUDSON VALLEY, BERKSHIRES AND NORTHWESTERN CONNECTICUT... The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...The Catskills, middle Hudson Valley, upper Hudson Valley, Berkshires and northwest Connecticut. * WIND...Northwest at 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...20 to 35 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
